name: One Model
description: One Model’s founding team has spent years in the workforce analytics space, beginning their journey together at Infohrm (since acquired by SuccessFactors, then SAP). While working with hundreds of organizations, they saw customers struggle with the complexities of HR data to assemble it and generate any meaningful insight from it. So in late 2014, Chris Butler, David Wilson, and Matthew Wilton founded One Model with the mission of making an organization’s most complex data accessible and valuable for all. They built a team and platform around the vision of business leaders seamlessly interacting with workforce data to unlock value in their people and their organizations. Today, One Model is trusted by large organizations who want to work with a team of HR data experts who are passionate about your success!
features: More Insights with the People Data Cloud
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: Brilliant people analytics. Know everything about your workforce. Make better, faster, more ethical talent decisions.
ShortDescription: One Model’s founding team has spent years in the workforce analytics space, beginning their journey together at Infohrm (since acquired by SuccessFactors, then SAP).
enhanced_description: One Model is a workforce analytics platform designed to transform complex HR data into accessible and valuable insights for business leaders. Founded by a team with extensive experience in workforce analytics (ex-Infohrm, SuccessFactors, SAP), the platform aims to empower organizations to know everything about their workforce and make better, faster, more ethical talent decisions. It offers flexibility to fit diverse business needs, provides deep insights through its 'People Data Cloud,' and ensures advanced security and privacy. One Model is specifically aimed at large organizations looking to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity, hire top talent faster and more efficiently, and reduce the cost of hiring qualified employees through data-driven approaches.
key_use_cases: Making complex HR data accessible and valuable for insights
Informing and improving talent decisions (e.g., hiring)
Optimizing hiring processes and reducing associated costs
Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
Achieving faster and more efficient talent acquisition
competitive_advantages: Founding team's extensive prior experience in workforce analytics (Infohrm, SuccessFactors, SAP)
Support from a team of HR data experts dedicated to customer success
Flexible platform designed to adapt to business needs
Leveraging a 'People Data Cloud' for comprehensive insights
roi_benefits: Reduced cost of hiring qualified employees
Increased efficiency and speed in hiring top talent
Improved hiring manager productivity and confidence
